page.title: 15Shopping 2 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
{77}out of 78 people{did not use the {area shops}for their main shopping.
For food and household shopping: 56 people went to Leominster ( 8 miles east ) 16 people went to Hereford ( 19 miles south ) 4 people went to Presteigne ( 4 miles west of Byton ) 1 person went to Ludlow ( 11 miles north-east ) { Most people shopped in the same town every time although 27 people sometimes went to a different town. { { The majority of people shopped {weekly. 4 people shopped daily 54 people shopped weekly. 20 people shopped (daily/weekly) None of them shopped monthly.
